short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy a Jira link with the Ticket Number and Title a HTML, ready to be pasted into Outlook or Websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin enables you to copy a Jira Ticket link with formatting to clipboard to paste  with ticket title.
